developerNote.title: A Note From the Developer
developerNote.content: Pocket Ninja is your shopping companion that helps you save on every purchase by showing you the nearest store offering the best price. Pocket Ninja works best when we all contribute. Every receipt you upload helps everyone in Sapporo save money. Together, we can build a community where smart shopping is easy and accessible for all. Small steps, big savings!
